author: protolambda
content:
Added an "Updates" section to the meta-spec, so everyone can stay up-to-date with the important events: https://notes.ethereum.org/@protolambda/rayonism#Updates

Also, here is a new work-in-progress guide describing the setup of a multi-client post-merge devnet: https://notes.ethereum.org/@protolambda/merge-devnet-setup-guide
I'm going to update some of my eth2 genesis tooling to support the merge-devnets. We're going for an approach with the deposit contract on the network itself, starting from genesis. Exciting!
